title.rendered: Industry News: Global Prime and PrimeXM Extend Its Partnership Integrating TraderEvolution

content.rendered:
PrimeXM a technology provider for the brokerage industry announced this Tuesday that it is going to expand its long-established partnership with ASIC regulated broker Global Prime to exclusively host setup with TraderEvolution.

Global Prime is one of the first brokers to integrate the TraderEvolution trading platform, which will be focused on the institutional side of the company’s business. According to the statement, PrimeXM has customised a platform to meet Global Prime’s needs and will exclusively provide the setup for integration via its infrastructure in New York and London.

The server setup located at the Equinix NY4 and LD4 locations will include Production, Disaster Recovery, and Demo environments.

Elan Bension, Director at Global Prime commented on the partnership:

“Global Prime has been with PrimeXM for nearly 4 years and has found the technology to be robust with round the clock support for PrimeXM XCore, and MT4 retail trading platforms.”

Global Head of Sales at PrimeXM Andreas Charalambous added:

“Consistent uptime and low latency have been at the core of PrimeXM’s offering since its founding. We are proud to have been selected by Global Prime for this setup as we reach yet another milestone in our partnership.”

The founder and CEO of TraderEvolution, Roman Nalivayko noted:

“Оur options for platform customization and additional development helped us to meet 100% of Global Prime’s requirements and allowed to build an outstanding offering for the institutional and retail part of their business.”

“PrimeXM is a great choice for us to continue to manage 3rd party platforms such as TraderEvolution under the one umbrella co-located with direct access to our tier 1 and nonbank liquidity” Bension added.
